cheeses = ['adam', 'bree', 'cheddar', 'stilton', 'gouda', 'cottage']

for i, cheese in enumerate(cheeses):
    if len(cheese) >= 5:
        cheese = "premium " + cheese
        print(cheese)
        cheeses[i] = cheese

premium cheddar
premium stilton
premium gouda
premium cottage

cheeses
